William Harley^

Fromi Burton Paulu
Subject! A Correction!
The third paragraph of my memorandum on March 24/30, to
the same four of you who are receiving this one, contained
an error which resulted from my transposition of the figures
in Harryfs letter to me of March 17.
The last sentence in ray third paragraph should have read*
"Now I know for oertaln that you have received and ok*d the
first two charges! one for $151.60 against the *Adm. Gen.1
item, and another for 131.95 against the #Current Opportunitiesâ€¢
fund."
(The mistake was in my substituting $348.40 for $151.60.)
The correct "free balance" now is $816.45.
X hope this hasn't caused anyone any trouble.
BPids
